title: I Thought Camille Was Pretty Balanced
body: Cause I mostly built her bruiser. Then I played lethality Camille. xddd

replies.body: ... im concerned that you thought Camille was balanced.
Camille honestly isn't that bad. Her numbers may be a bit high, but her kit is definitely not one of the more broken ones.
... there's ALOT more wrong with her than just her numbers

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_ejzNq4Cl_g

I agree with this video for the most part.
Like what? Let me know and I'll see if ya got some merit.
I thought she was pretty balanced, too. Each one of her abilities gave you a good second to react, unlike {{champion:107}} {{champion:1}} {{champion:54}}

Lethality camille?

Did somebody say blow up instantly and never getting a sheen auto?
...Her bruiser build was flat out op.
